Wondrous item, uncommon (requires attunement)
These ragged grey cloaks are death shrouds taken from actual tombs and enchanted to hide a living humanoid creature from the notice of the undead. All undead with a Wisdom score of 11 or lower consider you as undead and ignore you unless directly attacked or addressed by you. Any undead with a Wisdom score of 12 or higher can make a DC 15 Wisdom (Perception) check to see through the illusion. (If you are in sunlight, the undead rolls with advantage.)
The shroud becomes non-magical and crumbles to dust 24 hours after it is first worn or if it is exposed to sunlight for more than an hour.
